    \index{xformslib \textit{(package)}|(}
\section{Package xformslib}

    \label{xformslib}

xforms-python - Python wrapper for XForms (X11) GUI C toolkit library
using ctypes.

Copyright (C) 2009, 2010  Luca Lazzaroni ``LukenShiro''
e-mail: <\href{mailto:lukenshiro@ngi.it}{lukenshiro@ngi.it}>

This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
it under the terms of the GNU Lesser General Public License as
published by the Free Software Foundation, version 2.1 of the License.

This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. See the
GNU Lesser General Public License for more details.

You should have received a copy of the GNU LGPL along with this
program. If not, see <\href{http://www.gnu.org/licenses/}{http://www.gnu.org/licenses/}>.

See CREDITS file to read acknowledgements and thanks to XForms,
ctypes and other developers.

%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%%                                Modules                                %%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

\subsection{Modules}

\begin{itemize}
\setlength{\parskip}{0ex}
\item \textbf{flbasic}: 
flbasic.py - xforms-python's functions to manage basic generic objects.


  \textit{(Section \ref{xformslib:flbasic}, p.~\pageref{xformslib:flbasic})}

\item \textbf{flbitmap}: 
flbitmap.py - xforms-python's functions to manage bitmap objects.


  \textit{(Section \ref{xformslib:flbitmap}, p.~\pageref{xformslib:flbitmap})}

\item \textbf{flbrowser}: 
flbrowser.py - xforms-python's functions to manage browser objects.


  \textit{(Section \ref{xformslib:flbrowser}, p.~\pageref{xformslib:flbrowser})}

\item \textbf{flbutton}: 
flbutton.py - xforms-python's functions to manage button objects.


  \textit{(Section \ref{xformslib:flbutton}, p.~\pageref{xformslib:flbutton})}

\item \textbf{flcanvas}: 
flcanvas.py - xforms-python's functions to manage canvas objects.


  \textit{(Section \ref{xformslib:flcanvas}, p.~\pageref{xformslib:flcanvas})}

\item \textbf{flchart}: 
flchart.py - xforms-python's functions to manage chart objects.


  \textit{(Section \ref{xformslib:flchart}, p.~\pageref{xformslib:flchart})}

\item \textbf{flclock}: 
flclock.py - xforms-python's functions to manage clock objects.


  \textit{(Section \ref{xformslib:flclock}, p.~\pageref{xformslib:flclock})}

\item \textbf{flcounter}: 
flcounters.py - xforms-python's functions to manage counters.


  \textit{(Section \ref{xformslib:flcounter}, p.~\pageref{xformslib:flcounter})}

\item \textbf{flcursor}: 
flcursor.py - xforms-python's functions to manage cursor objects.


  \textit{(Section \ref{xformslib:flcursor}, p.~\pageref{xformslib:flcursor})}

\item \textbf{fldial}: 
fldial.py - xforms-python's functions to manage dial objects.


  \textit{(Section \ref{xformslib:fldial}, p.~\pageref{xformslib:fldial})}

\item \textbf{flfilesys}: 
flfilesys.py - xforms-python's functions to manage files and directories.


  \textit{(Section \ref{xformslib:flfilesys}, p.~\pageref{xformslib:flfilesys})}

\item \textbf{flflimage}: 
flflimage.py - xforms-python's functions to manage image objects.


  \textit{(Section \ref{xformslib:flflimage}, p.~\pageref{xformslib:flflimage})}

\item \textbf{flformbrowser}: 
flformbrowser.py - xforms-python's functions to manage formbrowser
objects.


  \textit{(Section \ref{xformslib:flformbrowser}, p.~\pageref{xformslib:flformbrowser})}

\item \textbf{flglcanvas}: 
flglcanvas.py - xforms-python's functions to manage GLcanvas objects.


  \textit{(Section \ref{xformslib:flglcanvas}, p.~\pageref{xformslib:flglcanvas})}

\item \textbf{flgoodies}: 
flgoodies.py - xforms-python's functions to manage goodies objects.


  \textit{(Section \ref{xformslib:flgoodies}, p.~\pageref{xformslib:flgoodies})}

\item \textbf{flinput}: 
flinput.py - xforms-python's functions to manage input objects.


  \textit{(Section \ref{xformslib:flinput}, p.~\pageref{xformslib:flinput})}

\item \textbf{flmisc}: 
flmisc.py - xforms-python's functions to manage miscellaneous objects.


  \textit{(Section \ref{xformslib:flmisc}, p.~\pageref{xformslib:flmisc})}

\item \textbf{flnmenu}: 
flnmenu.py - xforms-python's functions to manage nmenu objects.


  \textit{(Section \ref{xformslib:flnmenu}, p.~\pageref{xformslib:flnmenu})}

\item \textbf{flpopup}: 
flpopup.py - xforms-python's functions to manage popups.


  \textit{(Section \ref{xformslib:flpopup}, p.~\pageref{xformslib:flpopup})}

\item \textbf{flpositioner}: 
flpositioner.py - xforms-python's functions to manage positioner objects.


  \textit{(Section \ref{xformslib:flpositioner}, p.~\pageref{xformslib:flpositioner})}

\item \textbf{flscrollbar}: 
flscrollbar.py - xforms-python's functions to manage scrollbar objects.


  \textit{(Section \ref{xformslib:flscrollbar}, p.~\pageref{xformslib:flscrollbar})}

\item \textbf{flselect}: 
flselect.py - xforms-python's functions to manage select objects.


  \textit{(Section \ref{xformslib:flselect}, p.~\pageref{xformslib:flselect})}

\item \textbf{flslider}: 
flslider.py - xforms-python's functions to manage slider objects.


  \textit{(Section \ref{xformslib:flslider}, p.~\pageref{xformslib:flslider})}

\item \textbf{flspinner}: 
flspinner.py - xforms-python's functions to manage spinner objects.


  \textit{(Section \ref{xformslib:flspinner}, p.~\pageref{xformslib:flspinner})}

\item \textbf{fltabfolder}: 
fltabfolder.py - xforms-python's functions to manage tablfolder objects.


  \textit{(Section \ref{xformslib:fltabfolder}, p.~\pageref{xformslib:fltabfolder})}

\item \textbf{flthumbwheel}: 
flthumbwheel.py - xforms-python's functions to manage thumbwheel objects.


  \textit{(Section \ref{xformslib:flthumbwheel}, p.~\pageref{xformslib:flthumbwheel})}

\item \textbf{fltimer}: 
fltimer.py - xforms-python's functions to manage timer objects.


  \textit{(Section \ref{xformslib:fltimer}, p.~\pageref{xformslib:fltimer})}

\item \textbf{flxbasic}: 
xforms-python's functions to handle X Window drawing stuff.


  \textit{(Section \ref{xformslib:flxbasic}, p.~\pageref{xformslib:flxbasic})}

\item \textbf{flxyplot}: 
flxyplot.py - xforms-python's functions to manage xyplot objects.


  \textit{(Section \ref{xformslib:flxyplot}, p.~\pageref{xformslib:flxyplot})}

\item \textbf{library}: 
library.py - Convenience functions to deal with xforms-python wrapper's
functions.


  \textit{(Section \ref{xformslib:library}, p.~\pageref{xformslib:library})}

\item \textbf{vers}
  \textit{(Section \ref{xformslib:vers}, p.~\pageref{xformslib:vers})}

\item \textbf{xfdata}: 
xfdata.py - Data, constants and variables to be used with xforms-python.


  \textit{(Section \ref{xformslib:xfdata}, p.~\pageref{xformslib:xfdata})}

\end{itemize}
